title: Create TRACK LAYOUT-belongs-to-race-track Relationship
description:
* The relationship ›belongs-to-race-track‹ is created when the provided IDs of the TRACK LAYOUT and RACE TRACK are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›belongs-to-race-track‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* At the same time a TRACK LAYOUT can only be in a ›belongs-to-race-track‹ relationship with one RACE TRACK
